Uses of Class
com.complexible.stardog.api.ConnectionConfiguration

  • Packages that use ConnectionConfiguration 
    Package Description
    com.complexible.stardog.api
    Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS.
    com.complexible.stardog.api.admin
    SNARL API support for Stardog DBMS administration
    com.complexible.stardog.empire
    Bindings for using Stardog as a DataSource for the Empire library
    com.complexible.stardog.sesame
    Provides classes for Stardog-Sesame integration

    • Uses of ConnectionConfiguration in com.complexible.stardog.api

      Methods in com.complexible.stardog.api that return ConnectionConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.copy()
      ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.credentials(String theUsername, String thePassword)
      Specify the username and password that should be used to authenticate to the database.
      ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.database(String theDB)
      Specify the name of the db you want to connect to
      static ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.from(String theConnectionString)
      Create a SNARLConnectionConfiguration based on the full connection string.
      ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.reasoning(ReasoningType theReasoningType)
      Specify the type of reasoning you would like the connection to utilize
      ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.server(String theServerURL)
      Specify the URL of the database server.
      static ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.to(String theDBName)
      Create a new configuration object for connecting to the Stardog database with the provided name
      ConnectionConfiguration ConnectionConfiguration.with(com.complexible.common.base.Options theOptions)
      Use the given options as parameters to the connection
      Methods in com.complexible.stardog.api with parameters of type ConnectionConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConnectionPoolConfig ConnectionPoolConfig.using(ConnectionConfiguration theConfig)
      Create a new ConnectionPoolConfig for the provided ConnectionConfiguration.
